rooms.description: Spacious entry with Vastu-compliant placement for auspicious entry and natural light.
Large living area with Art Deco style detailing, incorporating geometric patterns and chrome finishes. Vastu recommendations include proper alignment with the main entrance.
Fully equipped modern kitchen designed with energy-efficient appliances and adherence to local norms. Placement is in the north-eastern corner as per Vastu.
Adjacent to kitchen, open space for dining with Art Deco style lighting fixtures. Positioned in a way to ensure clear view from the living room.
A dedicated quiet library area integrated into the ground floor, designed for reading and study with ample natural lighting. Vastu guidelines suggest a quiet corner location for concentration.

openings.description: Grand double door entrance with Art Deco motifs and secure access. Provides a welcoming transition aligned with Vastu principles.
Large windows to ensure natural light, designed in Art Deco style with geometric window trims.
Access doors to the rooftop terrace and service areas. Complying with Vastu recommendations for balance between open space and enclosed living areas.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom designed in an Art Deco aesthetic with elegant wall finishes and built-in wardrobes. Vastu recommends north-west positioning for calmness.
Second bedroom with modern Art Deco styling and sufficient storage, placed in the eastern part of the floor as per Vastu for energy.
Functional bathroom with essential fixtures. Positioned according to local norms and Vastu guidelines to avoid water pooling in adjacent areas.

openings.description: Elegant staircase connecting ground and first floor, designed with Art Deco balustrades and safety handrails.
Access to the rooftop terrace from the living areas above. Ensures natural light flow into the bedrooms.

rooms.description: Multipurpose studio space that can function as an office or guest room. Designed with Art Deco motifs and flexible layout in adherence to local building norms.

openings.description: Direct access to the rooftop terrace through a well-designed opening, ensuring seamless integration with ground floor elements.
Additional access point for light and ventilation in line with Vastu principles.
